name: Watermelon Gummy | BMW | Developed
description:
Recipe made by Max Savage using the flavors from Beginner Mixer Week (Episode 2) on Developed.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/
Discover our website at www.developeddiy.com
author: MaxSavage

reviews.text: Just finally got a chance to try this recipe out, I love what the Raspberry does to accent the watermelon gummy candy in this mix. Gummy watermelon recipes can be tricky to get perfectly right imo but this is well done, the raspberry really helps brighten up the mix and makes it pop. Thanks Max
